overview_of_class: For experienced nonfiction writers, this course will provide continuing work in the analysis and writing of creative nonfiction, emphasizing close reading of assigned selections and careful writing and revision of student work. The course builds on the premises, assignments, and goals of 308-A, with focus on the writing of a longer work; students may enroll without having completed that course. May not be audited or taken P/N.
name: Advanced Reading and Writing Creative Nonfiction II
subject: ENGLISH
